meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shannon Dillmore Marianne Novak Susan Cole Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7381.

td.p: Shannon Dillmore, a genomics research manager from Raleigh, North Carolina
Marianne Novak, an Orthodox rabbinical student from Skokie, Illinois
Susan Cole, a legislative librarian from Bowie, Maryland (whose 3-day cash winnings total $67,800)

tr.td: SPEECH! SPEECH!
ABBREV.
AN "F" IN SCIENCE
(Alex: From the website 100people.org...)
IF THE WORLD WERE 100 PEOPLE
STAR FISH
THAT'S REPETITIVE

tr.td: Susan
Marianne
Shannon
PEACH! PEACH!
CLASSICAL MUSICIANS
THE TROPIC OF CANCER

IMPRISONED AUTHORS
SAY "NE"THING
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letters "N-E".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Shannon] I don\'t know. Is that a prime number? Doesn\'t matter, because it\'s enough to make you the champion.)
SusanWhat is the Battle of New Orleans?
$7,000
MarianneWhat is the Battle of Gettysburg?
$10,299
ShannonWhat is the battle of New Orleans?
$8,031
the Battle of New Orleans')

Marianne
Shannon

3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $20,631

Marianne
